multiword list items list concept originally proposed newell simon shaw single computer words elements list report describes consecutive words element results considerable saving space required hold amount data execution time required perform process data description standard list structures singleword items multiword items introduced variablelength items spaceutilization problems finally examples illustrate multiword lists paper attempts draw recent papers applied concepts ways relate general problems cacm june 1964 comfort ca64616 jb march 9 1978 9:15 pm 124 4 151 124 4 151 151 4 151 151 4 151 151 4 151 151 4 151 151 4 151 151 4 151 162 4 151 198 4 151 112 4 151 112 4 151 1132 4 151 1214 4 151 138 4 151 1388 4 151 139 4 151 1393 4 151 1485 4 151 1486 4 151 1487 4 151 1549 4 151 1549 4 151 1549 4 151 1552 4 151 157 4 151 1665 4 151 176 4 151 1826 4 151 186 4 151 1878 4 151 1878 4 151 1946 4 151 1957 4 151 378 4 151 26 4 151 2155 4 151 2155 4 151 2168 4 151 2168 4 151 2719 4 151 2723 4 151 2723 4 151 2838 4 151 2842 4 151 2855 4 151 2857 4 151 2879 4 151 377 4 151 38 4 151 316 4 151 3112 4 151 627 4 151 16 4 151 151 5 151 151 5 151 151 5 151 1211 5 151 21 5 151 1549 5 151 196 5 151 378 5 151 292 5 151 46 5 151 731 5 151 793 5 151 794 5 151 16 6 151 151 6 151 151 6 151 151 6 151 151 6 151 162 6 151 162 6 151 1184 6 151 1211 6 151 1552 6 151 21 6 151 1879 6 151 2435 6 151 2596 6 151 2734 6 151 2747 6 151 2768 6 151 46 6 151 627 6 151 731 6 151 753 6 151 cacm151
